Senbon Rain''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online]]'' |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu, Shurikenjutsu, |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Mid |users=Shigure, Aoi Rokushō~anime, Fuyō~anime, Suiren~anime, Genma Shiranui~game, Kin Tsuchi~game, Midare~game |hand signs=Tiger |debut manga=58 |boruto=No |sasuke retsuden=No |konoha shinden=No |debut anime=34 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto: The Broken Bond |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game }} This technique requires special [[umbrella]]s that have been spring-loaded with hundreds of [[senbon]]. The user opens several of these umbrellas and spins them into the air. As they spin, they release the combined thousands of senbon, which the user controls with their [[chakra]]. The user directs the senbon to fall upon the target, striking them all over like rain; to control so many senbon at once requires a great deal of training. Because of how many senbon there are, evading all of them is almost impossible. Furthermore, each senbon is supposed to be able to penetrate a five millimetre-thick steel plate. The senbon can also be dipped in [[poison]] to increase their lethality.''Naruto'' episode 104 Despite all this, [[Gaara]]'s [[Shield of Sand]] completely protected him from damage.''Naruto'' chapter 58 == Trivia == * In ''[[Naruto Mobile]]'', Genma Shiranui and Kin Tsuchi use this technique without using umbrellas.
